# Email addresses
[a-z]+\@recursion.ninja

# URL matcher
(((ht|f)tp(s?))\://)?(www.|[a-zA-Z].)?[a-zA-Z0-9\-\.]+\.\w+(\:[0-9]+)*(/($|[a-zA-Z0-9\.\,\;\?\'\\\+&amp;%\$#\=~_\-]+))*

# Weird false positives
Alike
Pandoc
bibfile
bottom
configurable
estimate
import(ant(ly)?)?
left
module
qualified
right
rule
template
version
